quest.Name: Combing the Salt Dunes
quest.Accomplishment: You found the final resting place of great saltback tortoises.
quest.Hagiograph: In the month of =month= of =year=, wise =name= kneeled by fading giants and sang a solemn dirge in their honor.
quest.Gospel: Wandering through salt valleys, =name= came upon a great funeral ceremony for the kings and queens of saltbacks. There =name= sang for three days and three nights a mournful dirge so fair and true the Sun and Moon weeped in unison.

step.Name: Find a Walking Dune
step.text: In the Great Salt Desert, find a walking dune and follow it.

step.Name: Locate the Saltback Graveyard
step.text: Find the saltbacks' final resting place somewhere in the Great Salt Desert.

step.Name: Report Back to Cracks-the-Saltback-Shell
step.text: Return to Cracks-the-Saltback-Shell and report your findings.

quest.Name: The Scute Child
quest.Accomplishment: You ventured into the graveyard and uncovered a secret about its location.
quest.Hagiograph: =name=, the keeper of secrets, chose to protect the graveyard's mysteries, earning the trust of its guardians.
quest.Gospel: In the shadow of the graveyard, =name= made a choice that would echo through the ages: to guard the sanctity of the resting place.

step.Name: Consult with Warden Qoruda
step.text: Speak with Warden Qoruda to gain insight into the Saltbacks Graveyard.

step.Name: Keep the Graveyard’s Location Secret
step.text: Choose to keep the location of the Saltback Graveyard a secret, ensuring its sanctity remains intact.

quest.Name: Return to Qoruda
quest.Accomplishment: You returned to the Saltback Graveyard and fulfilled your duty.
quest.Hagiograph: =name= retraced their steps to the sacred graveyard, honoring their promise to the guardians.
quest.Gospel: =name=, bound by their word, returned to the Saltback Graveyard, ensuring the legacy of the saltbacks endured.

step.Name: Return to the Saltback Graveyard
step.text: Travel back to the Saltback Graveyard and report to Warden Qoruda.
